short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your candidate sourcing process with the Repetor Candidate Sourcing Extension!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designed specifically for recruiters and hiring managers, this powerful Chrome extension allows you to seamlessly add candidates to Repetor's Applicant Tracking System (ATS) from any website, including LinkedIn, job boards, and more.
 
Take your recruitment process to the next level with the Repetor Candidate Sourcing Extension. Start sourcing smarter, faster, and more efficiently today!
Learn about more features from www.repetor.com, email us at support@repetor.com / info@repetor.com.
